name: News
yoast_head:
<!-- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO plugin v17.1 - https://yoast.com/wordpress/plugins/seo/ -->
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<link rel="canonical" href="/blog/category/news/" />
<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="News Archives - Print a Thing" />
<meta property="og:url" content="/blog/category/news/" />
<meta property="og:site_name" content="Print a Thing" />
<meta name="twitter:card" content="summary" />
<script type="application/ld+json" class="yoast-schema-graph">{
	    "@context": "https://schema.org",
	    "@graph": [
	        {
	            "@type": "WebSite",
	            "@id": "/blog/#website",
	            "url": "/blog/",
	            "name": "Print a Thing",
	            "description": "Welcome to Print a Thing's Blog",
	            "potentialAction": [
	                {
	                    "@type": "SearchAction",
	                    "target": {
	                        "@type": "EntryPoint",
	                        "urlTemplate": "/blog/?s={search_term_string}"
	                    },
	                    "query-input": "required name=search_term_string"
	                }
	            ],
	            "inLanguage": "en-US"
	        },
	        {
	            "@type": "CollectionPage",
	            "@id": "/blog/category/news/#webpage",
	            "url": "/blog/category/news/",
	            "name": "News Archives - Print a Thing",
	            "isPartOf": {
	                "@id": "/blog/#website"
	            },
	            "breadcrumb": {
	                "@id": "/blog/category/news/#breadcrumb"
	            },
	            "inLanguage": "en-US",
	            "potentialAction": [
	                {
	                    "@type": "ReadAction",
	                    "target": [
	                        "/blog/category/news/"
	                    ]
	                }
	            ]
	        },
	        {
	            "@type": "BreadcrumbList",
	            "@id": "/blog/category/news/#breadcrumb",
	            "itemListElement": [
	                {
	                    "@type": "ListItem",
	                    "position": 1,
	                    "name": "Home",
	                    "item": "/blog/"
	                },
	                {
	                    "@type": "ListItem",
	                    "position": 2,
	                    "name": "News"
	                }
	            ]
	        }
	    ]
	}</script>
<!-- / Yoast SEO plugin. -->

@graph.name: Print a Thing
@graph.description: Welcome to Print a Thing's Blog
